original:
Janet Cardiff and George Bures Miller are Canadian artists who gained international recognition for their innovative multimedia installations. They represented Canada at the 49th Venice Biennale in 2001, where their work garnered significant attention and acclaim.


Mark Lewis, another prominent Canadian artist, represented Canada at the Venice Biennale in 2009. His films have been showcased in solo exhibitions at prestigious institutio
